lead_paragraph: Steven Wright, a 30-year-old knuckleballer, entered a game against the Yankees in the 15th inning and got the win in the 19th.

headline.main: Long Night’s Work for a Red Sox Pitcher, and Then It’s Back to the Minors
headline.print_headline: A Quick Passage From Savior to Castoff

snippet: Steven Wright, a 30-year-old knuckleballer, entered a game against the Yankees in the 15th inning and got the win in the 19th.
